content:
Yes, Hanna Andersson does offer gift wrapping services for their products, including the onesie and blanket set.

When you place your order, you can select the "Gift Wrap" option during checkout. They offer a variety of gift wrap designs and styles to choose from, including some adorable options for baby gifts.

Here are the details on Hanna Andersson's gift wrapping service:

* **Gift Wrap:** $5-$10 (depending on the wrapping style and size of the gift)
* **Gift Box:** $10-$20 (includes a sturdy gift box and wrapping)
* **Premium Gift Box:** $20-$30 (includes a luxurious gift box, wrapping, and a personalized gift card)

If you choose to have your gift wrapped, Hanna Andersson will beautifully package the onesie and blanket set in a gift box or bag, complete with a ribbon and gift card.

Regarding the gift receipt, Hanna Andersson does include a gift receipt with all gift-wrapped orders. The gift receipt will include the following information:

* A note indicating that the item is a gift
* The price of the item (without the gift wrapping cost)
* A message saying "Gift Wrapped for [Recipient's Name]"

The gift receipt will not include the price of the gift wrapping or any other personal information. This way, the recipient can easily exchange or return the gift if needed, without knowing the price or any other details.

Just keep in mind that if you're purchasing the gift for a baby shower, you may want to consider including a personalized gift card or note with the gift, as the gift receipt will only include the recipient's name.

I hope that helps!
